scripts.ci:check: pnpm lint && pnpm typecheck && pnpm test && pnpm storybook:build
scripts.test:a11y:axe: pnpm storybook:build && playwright test --config playwright.config.ts tests/visual/a11y-axe.spec.ts
scripts.test:a11y:regression: pnpm storybook:build && playwright test --config playwright.config.ts tests/visual/a11y-regression.spec.ts
scripts.test:visual: pnpm storybook:build && playwright test --config playwright.config.ts tests/visual/components.spec.ts
scripts.test:visual:update: pnpm storybook:build && playwright test --config playwright.config.ts tests/visual/components.spec.ts --update-snapshots
